thread.title: Uplay is dead! Long live Ubisoft Club!

title: Uplay is dead! Long live Ubisoft Club!
text:
Uplay is dead! Long live Ubisoft Club! 
Published By: Lazygamer.net - Today 
Uplay is something of a dirty word for PC gamers that immediately makes people talk about DRM. But Uplay is gone... only to be replaced with...
